sentences.en: computer hardware that quickly became obsolete
sentences.cn: 很快就变得过时的电脑硬件

sentences.en: Electronic banking may make overthe - counter transactions obsolete.
sentences.cn: 电子银行服务也许会淘汰柜台交易.

sentences.en: First came the turbojet, now obsolete, then the turboprop, which is still found onboard small planes.
sentences.cn: 最开始的引擎是涡轮喷射式, 目前已淘汰; 然后是涡轮螺旋桨式引擎, 现在仍可在小飞机上看到.

sentences.en: He saw nothing beyond himself along the branch. His kind was obsolete.
sentences.cn: 他瞻望自己身后空无一物, 他属于过时的品种.

sentences.en: He tried to do away with the obsolete regulations.
sentences.cn: 他试图废除近时的规则.

sentences.en: He used elaborate sentences, carefully balanced , and obsolete, resplendent words.
sentences.cn: 他的句子精心雕琢, 用词讲究对仗, 好用废字,华丽的字.

sentences.en: It was an obsolete thing, and few cared to study it.
sentences.cn: 它本是一件老朽陈腐的东西, 很少有人愿意去研究它.

sentences.en: Most factories in the area are obsolete and badly managed.
sentences.cn: 这个地区的绝大多数工厂都十分陈旧，经营状况也非常糟糕。

sentences.en: So much equipment becomes obsolete almost as soon as it's made.
sentences.cn: 这么多设备几乎一生产出来就要被淘汰。

sentences.en: There ought to be a note on this obsolete word.
sentences.cn: 这个过时的词应有注释.

sentences.en: These goods are obsolete and will not fetch much on the market.
sentences.cn: 这些货品过时了,在市场上卖不了高价.

sentences.en: They tried to hammer obsolete ideas into the young people's heads.
sentences.cn: 他们竭力把陈旧思想灌输给青年.

sentences.en: This kind of weapon is obsolete.
We're going to junk these computers, they are obsolete.
sentences.cn: 我们准备换掉这些计算机, 因为都过时了.

sentences.en: Will computers render (= make ) books obsolete?
sentences.cn: 计算机会把书籍淘汰掉吗？

sentences.en: With technological changes many traditional skills have become obsolete.
sentences.cn: 随着技术的革新，许多传统技艺已被淘汰。

words.tran_cn: 荒废的；即将过时的；逐渐被废弃的

trans.tran_cn: 废弃的，老式的，已过时的，[生]已废退的
trans.tran_en: no longer useful, because something newer and better has been invented
